reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Neptun for one night before and one night after our voyage on the Hurtigruten Coastal voyage. The Hotel is situated a few minutes walk from the shops and the fjord.
reviews.title: Hotel before and after Hurtigruten voyage

reviews.text: On the first visit we were surprised to have an outward facing suite on Floor 6 for a one night stay but felt it was very tired and needed a thorough update. Bathroom was particularly in need of attention.
reviews.title: Nicest staff ever
Much nicer than it looks
reviews.text: We arrived close to midnight and found the male Receptionist friendly and helpful.

reviews.title: Memorable in so many little ways
reviews.text: On the second visit, we had an outward facing standard room on the fifth floor. Again we felt the room needed updating. The hair dryer was held together with tape for instance.
Check in was rapid but we found the female receptionist particularly unhelpful when asking for advice regarding an excursion. Staffing levels appeared too low on Reception to cope with demand.
reviews.title: very nice
